Description: Poster is a memorial from France to honor the individuals in the American army who died in France. Illustrated with many symbols; there appears a group of figures, symbolizing the soul and spirit of the American Army which helped France.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.
Subject: France -- Foreign relations -- United States.; World War, 1914-1918 -- Propaganda.; War posters -- France.;
